remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例中的文本显示的次数更改。The following example displays the number of times the text in a changes. 下面是示例 XAML 代码。Below is the XAML code for the example. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#DetectChangedTextExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/detectchangedtextexample.xaml#detectchangedtextexamplewholepage)] 下面是该示例的隐藏代码。Below is the code behind for the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取对象的集合，该集合包含有关已发生的更改的信息。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that contains information about the changes that occurred.

value.span: 对象的集合，该集合包含有关已发生的更改的信息。

span.span: A collection of objects that contains information about the changes that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还有一个控件对每个连续更改的对象。There is one object for each consecutive change to the control. 多个连续的更改可能会发生一个匹配项事件时更改需要更改基础文档的结构。More than one consecutive change can occur during one occurrence of the event when the change entails changing the structure of the underlying document. 例如，假设包含字符串`"This is some text."`的结构是`This is some text.`。For example, suppose that a contains the string `"This is some text."` The structure of the is `This is some text.`. 如果用户加粗文字`"is some"`的基础结构更改为`This is some text.`。If the user bolds the words `"is some"`, the structure of the underlying changes to `This is some text.`. 有实际发生由于用户的操作的四个更改：There are actually four changes that took place as a result of the user's action: 1. ``符号被删除并重新添加词之前`This`。The `` symbol is removed and re-added before the word `This`. 2. 符号``一词之后添加`This`。The symbols `` are added after the word `This`. 3. 符号``一词之后添加`some`。The symbols `` are added after the word `some`. 4. ``符号被删除并重新添加一词之后`Text`。The `` symbol is removed and re-added after the word `Text`. 一般情况下，以下将始终为 true:In general, the following will always be true: - 发生的更改的处于有效状态文档中的结果。The changes that occur result in the document being in a valid state. - 与控件中发生更改处相关连续，排序集合。The collection is ordered consecutively, related to where the change occurred in the control. 例如，表示位置 2 处的更改的对象是之前表示 10 位置处的更改的对象。For example, a object that represents a change at position 2 is before a object that represents a change at position 10. - 两个对象不表示重叠区域。Two objects do not represent an overlapping area. 值加的值上之一对象对于始终小于或等于的值的下一个集合中的对象。The value of plus the value of of one object is always less than or equal to the value of of the next object in the collection. 同样，值加的值上之一对象对于始终小于或等于的值的下一个集合中的对象。Likewise, the value of plus the value of of one object is always less than or equal to the value of of the next object in the collection. - 集合反映发生任何更改，即使存在似乎是没有净更改。The collection reflects whatever changes occurred, even if there seems to be no net change. 在前面的示例中，第一个或第四个更改会导致净更改，因为每个只需删除并重新添加``和``符号，分别。In the preceding example, neither the first or fourth change results in a net change, because each simply removed and re-added the `` and `` symbols, respectively. 但符号实际上已删除和添加，以便它们包含在集合中。But the symbols were actually removed and added, so they are included in the collection. 如果因属性更改，而发生的事件为空集合。If the event occurs as a result of a property change, is an empty collection. 在前面的示例中，如果用户加粗的整个字符串，属性设置为，但不是会添加或删除从文档中，因此为空。In the preceding example, if the user bolds the entire string, the property of the is set to , but nothing is added or removed from the document, so is empty. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
